title: My Honor???
body:
I dropped to dishonorable at the start of August, and I waited the 14 day ban. I got released from honor lock about 2 weeks after I got released from the ban. In the meantime, I've played maybe 300 games since, and I haven't even shown signs of progression. And, its been about 2 months since I got released from the honor lock. Why aren't I progressing my honor AT ALL? I've seen other people get a 2 week ban and drop to honor 0 and get back in 100 games and 20 days to honor 1. PLZ HELP ME RITO! Am I even progressing? I've been positive this whole time... I've even been reporting the toxic people and sometimes getting the "the person you reported...gotten punishment..." thing.. Plz help.
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: While your honor is currently unlocked and you *are* progressing at the normal rate, there are still a few instances where you've toed the line towards being toxic. While you haven't gotten punished for anything you've said so far, some of these things can still affect your honor. Hit up our Player Behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to go over your logs to show where some improvement could be made.
